document.title: SP418-Healthy Children: Becoming A Parent

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Welcome to HEALTHY CHILDREN â€” a series of 27 newsletters that will help you discover how your baby grows and develops each month. It will take you through some of the ups and downs, the ins and outs of being a parent. HEALTHY CHILDREN will talk about YOU and your feelings about being a new parent. It will also give practical advice and suggestions for A PARENT BECOMING you and your baby.
